## Getting Started

Include the following in your build.sbt file. [SBT](http://www.scala-sbt.org/) is the Simple Build Tool for Scala projects.

```scala
libraryDependencies += "com.github.jonnylaw" % "bayesian_dlm" % "0.1"
```

Read through the examples by navigating the documentation above.
